title: Thursday!
author: JGray
text:
You know, I think I'm officially just stringing words together for titles now. I mean, come one. What does "Surrender is the Best Revenge" even mean?

Also... furry guys.

Let's talk about it.

What do y'all think?

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: Other than the possible physical issues involved not really a problem. We ARE talking about Sentient humanoid life-forms after all. Although I'm starting to wonder if Chrys has a mate in every Arcana.

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: Does she like human girls and furry males?  Is that it?

replies.author: KFox*Guest*
replies.text: No problem with furry guys, as long as they are sentient.

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: As for the story: This must be a damn nasty war if prisoners are summarily executed upon capture.

replies.author: NoRAd*Guest*
replies.text: Surrender, surrender, but don't give yourself away.
